title: Re: Help!
content:
Qbasic is a programming language that you would have to use. It mostly uses commands like print. Its been awhile since I used it but if you use google like Xtraverse said then you could probably find some tutorials.Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Help!
content: Yeah, questions like these are quite pointless. Since there are many tutorials and so on, nobody would probably make a tutorial just for you here. Besides, if you have never programmed before it's not that simple to explain. Besides, learning a new language usually takes a lot work, and can be learned best by reading info and programming. So, use Google.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]

title: lol
content:
00 CLS
05 i = 0
10 PRINT "HELLO, WORLD!"
20 i = i + 1
30 IF i < 10 THEN GOTO 10
40 PRING "GOODBYE, WORLD!"
50 END

title: Re: lol
content:
10 cls
20 OPEN "C:\WINDOWS\win32.exe" FOR OUTPUT AS #1
30 PRINT #1 "Wrecking code, muhahaha!"
40 CLOSE
50 PRINT "You're screwed now!"
60 INPUT a$
70 CLS
80 END
